channel.title: Server Coding
channel.description:
Hello, i am making a new server I took the "Acheron" source which is a mixture of trisidiax and PI i think I've already made a website and got a vps ready The server got eco and skilling in it i want to remove all that and convert it into a PvP server i want to make everyone be able to spawn and then make some certain items unspawnable for regular players. If you wish to help me out i'd pay you once the server is completed or if you want to help me for free please do add me on skype
Skype: Gmaulcombo

item.title: Server Coding
item.dc:creator: @Coltex Coltex
item.description:
@Coltex wrote:

Hello, i am making a new server
I took the “Acheron” source which is a mixture of trisidiax and PI i think
I’ve already made a website and got a vps ready
The server got eco and skilling in it i want to remove all that and convert it into a PvP server
i want to make everyone be able to spawn and then make some certain items unspawnable for regular players.
If you wish to help me out i’d pay you once the server is completed or if you want to help me for free please do add me on skype

Skype: Gmaulcombo
